promoSection.heading: III International Youth Scientific School
promoSection.subHeading: Monitoring, protection and restoration of soil ecosystems under anthropogenic load
promoSection.text: In June 2024, on the basis of the Soil Health Laboratory of the D.I. Ivanovsky Academy of Biology and Biotechnology and the branch of the South Federal University in Gelendzhik, the III International Youth Scientific School “Monitoring, protection and restoration of soil ecosystems under anthropogenic load” will take place. It will be held in a hybrid format (in-person and remote). During the school, aspiring researchers, postgraduates and students will have the opportunity to listen to lectures by Russian and foreign leading scientists, attend master classes and discuss topical issues of monitoring, protection and restoration of soil ecosystems under anthropogenic load

themeList.theme1: Natural and anthropogenic factors of soil formation in the steppe and forest-steppe zones. Actual problems of physics, chemistry, biogeochemistry, and soil biology.
themeList.theme2: The role of the soil cover in ensuring the food security of the country. Resource-saving technologies in increasing the fertility of agricultural lands in the steppe and forest-steppe zones.
themeList.theme3: Theoretical and practical aspects of the assessment, protection, and rational use of soil cover with the participation of chernozems.
themeList.theme4: Soils of urban and technogenic landscapes of the steppe and forest-steppe zones.

registrationForm.heading: Registration form
registrationForm.description: To participate in the International Youth School-seminar
registrationForm.rulesAppendix: Rules for the design of articles

errorMsg.file: All files must be in doc or docx format

registrationForm.dropZoneDescription: The file containing the application for participation should be named as follows: The name of the participant, the word "Application" separated by a space (Ivanov_zajavka-conf.doc ) or (Ivanov_zajavka-shkola.doc ), a separate application should be made for each co-author. The file containing the article should be named after the first author (Ivanov.doc ).

articleRulesSection.p1: Publications: The proceedings are planned to be published by the beginning of the youth scientific school. The proceedings will not be sent by mail. The articles will be indexed in RSCI.
articleRulesSection.p2: There is no registration fee for participation in the youth scientific school.
articleRulesSection.p3: Participants book their own accommodation. The accommodation options for selfbooking in hotels can be found in the annex.
articleRulesSection.p4: Those wishing to book accommodation at the new campus of the Southern Federal University at 21 Sorge Street must submit an application to the address of the organizing committee of the conference no later than August 25, 2023. The cost of accommodation in double rooms with a separate kitchen is 700 rubles. per day (the price on the date of sending the letter).
